name: cereal
instructions: 1. put cereal into bowl;2. fill bowl with milk

name: mac and cheese
instructions: 1. bring a pot of water to a bowl.;2. cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water. At the same time, melt butter in saucepan over medium heat, add flour salt and pepper until smooth.;3. pour in milk slowly and stir until bubbling.;4. add cheese and stir until melted.;5. drain macaroni and fold into sauce until coated.

name: grilled cheese
instructions: 1. butter the outer sides of two bread slices.;2. placed the bread, butter side down, on a pan over medium heat.;3. top it with cheese slices.;4. allow to brown slightly before flipping.;5. slice the grilled cheese sandwich and serve.

name: dumplings
ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour,2 tsp baking powder,1 tsp white sugar,1/2 tsp salt,1 tbsp margarine,1/2 cup milk,
instructions: 1. stir together flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt in a bowl.;2. cut in butter until mixture is crumbly.;3. stir in milk and mix until a batter forms that is thick enough to be scooped with a spoon.;4. allow batter to rest for 3-5 minutes.;5. drop batter by spoonfuls into a boiling stew or soup.;6. cover and simmer iwthout lifting the lid for 15 minutes. serve.;
